name: ente-photos
description: Ente is an end-to-end encrypted photo and file backup solution with open-source clients. It lets users back up and browse media across devices while keeping encryption keys under their control, and also offers a hosted cloud service.
features: End-to-End Encryption: Photos encrypted before leaving your device. Zero-knowledge security.
Cross-Device Sync: Access media on all your devices seamlessly. Synchronized everywhere.
Open-Source Clients: Transparent, auditable code. Trust through verification.
Automatic Backup: Never lose precious memories. Continuous protection.
Key Control: You hold the encryption keys, not us. True privacy guaranteed.
Self-Hosted Option: Run your own backup server. Complete data sovereignty.
